elements.label: The Tune of Industry
elements.description: Hammers slam, fire roars, foremen yell warnings and instructions. This district thrums with the roar of living metal.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.label: Trapping
slots.description: power begets power

elements.label: The Tune of the Market
elements.description: The honey-laced voices of the merchants mix with the metal clink of coin against coin. Here, each transaction is a battle, each smile sharp as knives.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.label: Trapping
slots.description: power begets power

elements.label: The Tune of the Docks
elements.description: Never quiet, wether it's bars and saloons beckoning the sailors landwards, or water lapping at the quay, beckoning them back to sea.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.label: Trapping
slots.description: power begets power

elements.label: Church bells
elements.description: The bright and crisp sound calling a flock to the promise of enlightenment.

elements.label: The Hush of the Library
elements.description: The russle of paper, the dull thud of a book returned to its proper place on the proper shelf. Sacred Semi-Silence Serves Studious Souls.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.description: power begets power

elements.label: A Funeral Dirge
elements.description: The shuffle of feet, watched by downcast eyes. You might expect a widow's wail, but you are just as likely to hear nothing at all.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.label: Trapping
slots.description: power begets power

elements.label: The Tune of the Underworld
elements.description: Hushed conversation, careful footsteps. A dull thud comes from an alley, as a shingle slides from the roof.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story

elements.label: The Tune of the Bars
elements.description: The echoes of laughter promise the impossible merriment of others. There is music in the air, and the dancing will not stop, not yet.

slots.label: Inspiration or Story
slots.description: In what manner do I want to engage with this Tune?

slots.label: Trapping
